## ClipmapTerrain.calculateLocalTransform() method

Calculates the local transformation matrix. For terrains, this only includes translation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
calculateLocalTransform(outMatrix: Matrix4x4): void;
```

</td><td>

Output matrix to store the result


</td></tr>

void
